text: Lucien De Brauwere (10 June 1951 â€“ 17 October 2020) was a Belgian cyclist. He competed in the individual road race at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Oudenaarde, Belgium. De Brauwere died on 17 October 2020 in Petegem-aan-de- Schelde, Belgium, aged 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Olympians for Belgium Category:People from East Flanders
title: Lucien De Brauwere
